pages.text: The $(item)Prickly Belt$() is a handy $(marked)trinket$(), able to store $(marked)potion effects$().$(br)When the wearer of the Belt is harmed, they will receive $(marked)positive$() and $(marked)neutral$() potion effects stored in the Belt. If a $(marked)negative$() effect is stored in the Belt, it will instead be applied to the $(marked)attacker$(), if present.$(br)Either way, this requires a tiny bit of $(marked)ME$().

To add a potion effect, simply combine the Belt with a $(item)Potion$(). The amount of uses is based off on both $(marked)duration$() and $(marked)amplifier$() of the used potion.$(br2)$(o)You can equip the Prickly Belt in the $(marked)Belt$()$(o) trinket slot$().
